sourcesContent: import '../src/components/css/Header.css' import React from 'react'; import ContactForm from './ContactForm'; import { FaJs, FaPhp, FaReact, FaSass, FaLaravel, FaSymfony, FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; import Mycv from './Mycv'; import { useState } from "react"; import Body from './Body'; import App from './App'; const Header = () => { const handleScrollDown = () => { window.scroll({ top: document.body.offsetHeight, down: 2, behavior: 'smooth', }); } return ( < div > < div className = "headerContainer" > < div className = "iconsBlock" > < h1 > WEBACADEMIE BY EPITECH < /h1> < h2 > Recherche un contrat en alternance < /h2> < div className = "btns" > < button className = 'btn btn-compet' onClick = { handleScrollDown } > < span > ABOUT ME < /span> < /button> < button className = 'btn btn-projet' onClick = { handleScrollDown } > < span > MY WORKS < /span> < /button> < button className = 'btn btn-projet' onClick = { handleScrollDown } > < span > CONTACT ME < /span> < /button> < /div> < /div> < div className = "allInfo" > < div className = "infoBlock" > < h1 className = "bonjBienv" > Bonjour et Bienvenue < /h1> < h3 > Je m 'appelle < h1 > ADLAN ISAEV < /h1> < h3 > Je suis un < /h3> < h2 > DEVELOPPEUR FULL - STACK < /h2> < h4 > < FaMapMarkerAlt / > Strasbourg, France < /h4> < div className = "myInfo" > < a href = "https://www.linkedin.com/in/adlan-isaev-1097a6227/" target = '_blank' className = 'linkDin' > < FaLinkedin / > < /a> < a href = "https://github.com/isager1" target = '_blank' className = 'gitHub' > < FaGithub / > < /a> < /div> < /div> < img src = "./myphoto2.jpg" alt = "myphoto" / > < /div> < /div> < /div> ); } export default Header;
